data.name: My Furry Maid - 18+ Adult Only Patch
data.detailed_description: 18+ Adult Only patch that adds new sex scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.

pc_requirements.minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue.
